column1: Kilosa (Kilossa) is a city in the Morogoro Region of Tanzania
column2: East Africa. It is the administrative seat for Kilosa District. As of 2002
column3: the population of the town was 26

column1: Kilosa is a station on Tanzania's east-west Central Line railway
column2: and the junction where the Mikumi line branches to the south.

column1: The Battle of Kilosa was fought during the East African Campaign  in World War I.
